extension_description.message: Transform TED into the most sophisticated English learning tool

deepl_api_key_description.message: This is required to translate the subtitle. You can obtain your key at the DeepL account page.

deepl_api_url_description.message: This is required to translate the subtitle.

toggle_subtitles_shortcut_description.message: When you press the key you assigned here when the English subtitle is shown, it will be hidden; otherwise, it will appear.

toggle_translations_shortcut_description.message: When you press the key you assigned here when the translation text is shown, it will be hidden; otherwise, it will appear.

toggle_pause_shortcut_description.message: When you press the key you assigned here when the pause-sentence-by-sentence mode is disabled, it will be enabled; otherwise, it will halt.

repeat_shortcut_description.message: When you press the key you assigned here, the video will rewind at the beginning of the sentence you watched and play again from there.

toggle_play_and_pause_shortcut.message: Toggle play and pause shortcut key

toggle_play_and_pause_shortcut_descripti.message:
When you press the key you assigned here when the video is played, it will pause; otherwise, it will resume.

Want more shortcuts? Try Video Commander!

special_keys_description.message: If you want to set a special key, like the arrow key, this document might help.

subtitle_disabled.message: Mask the English subtitle when accessed or reloaded

subtitle_disabled_description.message: When checked, the English subtitle will automatically disappear when you access or reload the page. You can turn it on at any time by pressing the shortcut key.

translation_disabled.message: Mask the translation when accessed or reloaded

translation_disabled_description.message: When checked, the translation text will automatically disappear when you access or reload the page. You can turn it on at any time by pressing the shortcut key.

pause_sentence_by_sentence_enabled.message: Enable pause-sentence-by-sentence when accessed or reloaded

pause_sentence_by_sentence_enabled_descr.message: When checked, the pause-sentence-by-sentence mode will automatically be enabled when you access or reload the page. You can turn it off at any time by pressing the shortcut key.
